title: Hi. What does "Back Sensitivity" mean?
content:
What does Back Sensitivity actually mean?

If one increases it, what will happen in everyday use? I've just upgraded and never used the Google gestures before. I've tried searching the phone's help pages with no luck. Thanks.

Does it mean, if I try and go back, the "back" feature will manifest itself further into the screen? Or perhaps it will be more prevalent towards the edge of the screen?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
